mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subsidy_applications ( applicant_id, application_date, amount_requested, status ) VALUES ( #{applicantId}, #{applicationDate}, #{amountRequested}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT 1 FROM subsidy_applications sa WHERE sa.id = #{id} AND sa.deleted_at IS NULL LIMIT 1

SELECT sa.id AS applicationId, sa.applicant_id AS applicantId,
a.full_name AS applicantFullName, a.full_name_kana AS applicantFullNameKana, a.email AS applicantEmail, a.phone AS applicantPhone, a.postal_code AS applicantPostalCode, a.address1 AS applicantAddress1, a.address2 AS applicantAddress2,
sa.application_date AS applicationDate, sa.amount_requested AS amountRequested, sa.status AS status, sa.decision_date AS decisionDate, sa.approved_amount AS approvedAmount, sa.paid_date AS paidDate, sa.note AS note FROM subsidy_applications sa JOIN applicants a ON a.id = sa.applicant_id WHERE sa.id = #{id} AND sa.deleted_at IS NULL AND a.deleted_at IS NULL LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE subsidy_applications SET deleted_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
